string.name: welcome
string.b:
Welcometo the 
 Prototype App for 
 Fundamental
 Precipitation Studies in 
 Sub-Saharan Africa!!

resources.string:
1.		Provides historical precipitation 

 2.		Of the selected specific date 
			 and place in Sub-Saharan Africa 

 3.		Analytics of annual precipitation 

 4.		Helpful for study purpose
